channel.title: Convocation on Akshit Khurana

item.title: Thomas J. Miller's 2013 IIT Roorkee convocation address transcript
item.description: _Below is the text of the commencement address by Thomas J. Miller, for IITR’s convocation held September 21, 2013._ Ladies and Gentlemen, distinguished guests. I’m a little nervous. This is quite an honor, so I hope you are kind to me during the next period when I’m speaking to you, sharing some thoughts. My thoughts are actually structured in three parts: The first part is an apology. You see, the majority of what I’m going to talk about are the ideas that I have received from a poet, a musician and an artist.
